subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Oakland’s Yoenis Cespedes won the Home Run Derby with a total of 32 homers, but fans armed with gloves didn’t seem to care who hit the ball their way.
snippet: Oakland’s Yoenis Cespedes won the Home Run Derby with a total of 32 homers, but fans armed with gloves didn’t seem to care who hit the ball their way.
